title: The Genie from down under: wishing and hoping
other_title: The Genie from down under Series 1 Episode 1
The Genie from downunder : wishing and hoping
creator_contributor_role: Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
abstract: 'The Genie from down under' Series 1, Episode 1.
description: When upper class English girl Penelope Townes finds a magic opal which contains two Australian genies, Bruce and his son Baz, she thinks all her problems are over, and that she can have anything she wants. Bruce, however, has other ideas.
